data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 PB 3
data.actual_result: A "ghost" channel opens with the name of the voice channel. You can't send messages there and it's not functional.
data.expected_result: You will be connected to the voice channel.
data.short_description: Invite links for voice channels just open "ghost" text channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite that links to an voice chat - Use this invite link to open the server or to join a new server - Observe it
